page.title: 10Transport to school (Lound)
page.content: A SURVEY OF TRANSPORT USED BY THE FIRST YEAR TO GET TO SCHOOL 100 90 KEY 80 *** C = Car 70 *** B = Bus 60 *** T = Taxi 50 *** Bi=Bicycle 40 *** W = Walk 30 *** 20 *** 10****** *** 0 C B T Bi W When we looked at how people got to school we found that 83 people in the first year travelled by bus, 12 people travelled by car, 1 person by taxi, a few people cycled and nobody walked. If we had asked the whole school we would expect the same results. Had we done the survey in a town school we would expect most pupils to walk or cycle.
